definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership

sentences.english: I refuse to even use the hyphenated term Chinese-American.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至拒絕使用“美籍華裔”這個組合詞。

sentences.english: They are African-and-American kids, and their coming to D.C.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是非裔美籍的孩子，此次來環境保護署總部。

sentences.english: Was the first Asian-American to be governor of state in continental U. S.
sentences.chinese: 他是美籍華人在美國大陸的首位州長。

sentences.english: He is one of very few Hispanic people to have run a major US corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他是少數經營美國大公司的美籍西班牙人之一。
美籍匈牙利鋼琴家，教育家。

sentences.english: And the type of proof that the rabbinate prefers is peculiarly unsuited to Jewish life in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 而他們偏好的身份證明，是美籍猶太人非常不適應的。

sentences.english: I consider myself to be an American-Born-Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲自己是一個美籍華人。

sentences.english: The crisis of masculinity was portrayed as particularly sever within African American communities.
sentences.chinese: 男子氣概危機被認爲在美籍非裔團體中尤其嚴重。

sentences.english: Mongolian Americans have always followed Buddhism of the Tibetan (Lama) variety faithfully.
sentences.chinese: 美籍蒙古人一直信奉藏傳喇嘛教。

sentences.english: Today Mongolian Americans are employed in a variety of professional enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 如今的美籍蒙古人任職於各類專業性企業之中。

sentences.english: What terms like ABC and banana ignore is that being Chinese-American constitutes a very real identity in its own right.
sentences.chinese: 美籍華人並不一定在東西方的文化中左右爲難。

sentences.english: Li Zhen-dao is a Chinese-born American scientist.
sentences.chinese: 李政道是一個美籍華裔科學家。

sentences.english: Locke is the first Chinese-American to serve as ambassador to China.
sentences.chinese: 駱家輝是第一位擔任駐華大使的美籍華人。

sentences.english: He is not the only Chinese-American who doesn't have turkey at Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 對於美籍華人來說，感恩節不喫火雞的情況並不少見。

sentences.english: He does look like some Americans I have seen that are part of the Goth scene.
sentences.chinese: 但他長得像某些我看過的美籍哥德愛好者。

sentences.english: He had anAmericanbornAmerican-born wife, from a family in his native Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 他有一名美籍巴基斯坦妻子，兩個孩子和一幢房子。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
